attributes.value: Finds maintaining decorum a silly, fumbling waste of time
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Very rarely develops negative feelings toward things
Is often cheerful
Almost never feels discouraged
Is prone to strong feelings of lust
Likes to brawl
Doesn't stick with things if even minor difficulties arise
Tends to be a little wasteful when working on projects
Is quite polite
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Is very rarely moved by curiosity
Does not generally respond to emotional appeals
Never acts without prolonged deliberation, even to her own detriment and the harm of those around her
Really slow to heal
Willpower
A meager kinesthetic sense
Poor empathy
A meager ability with social relationships
